docs.text:
Welcome to the landing page for the desktop version of Edward William Lane's Arabic-English Lexicon.


Here are some quick links:






Documentation is 
here






Install binaries for Windows and OSX users are 
here






Issue tracker is 
here






So what is it ?


A presentation of Lane's Lexicon based on the digitization work of the Perseus Digital Library. It is a standalone desktop application, not a front-end to the Perseus website.


While PDFs of the original text are free available on the internet, this version offers




Clearer presentation


Easy navigation


Search


Print


Customization




and most importantly, it is, I hope, a little closer to the beauty of the original text.


The screenshot below will give you and idea of what if offers. If you're interested, follow one of the above links. There's a contact page in the documentation if you need to get in touch.



function sample() {
    window.open("images/example.png","Sample","menubar=1,width=800,960");
}




Sample
